extends java.lang.Object
    Controller for the main layout
    Author:
    Eric Keränen, Matias Vainio, Jere Salmensaari, Teemu Viljanen, Nico Järvinen

      • handleSaveAs

        private void handleSaveAs​(javafx.event.ActionEvent e)
                   throws java.io.IOException
        Calls a saving function from root, that opens a path chooser to save the file
        Parameters:
        e - ActionEvent
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if saving to file fails

        Creates a new note with placeholder title.
        Parameters:
        e - ActionEvent

      • handleDelete

        public void handleDelete​(javafx.event.ActionEvent e)
        Opens a separate window, that wants the users confirmation about the deletion of the currently selected file. File deletion is dependent on the state.
        Parameters:
        e - ActionEvent
        See Also:
        AbstractState

      • handleBold

        private void handleBold​(javafx.event.ActionEvent e)
        Handles keypress on "bold" button. Calls format method with bold parameter and selection in the note area.
        Parameters:
        e - {ActionEvent} action event which fires when user clicks a button.

      • handleItalic

        private void handleItalic​(javafx.event.ActionEvent e)
        Handles keypress on "italic" button. Calls format method with bold parameter and selection in the note area.
        Parameters:
        e - {ActionEvent} action event which fires when user clicks a button.

      • handleUnderline

        private void handleUnderline​(javafx.event.ActionEvent e)
        Handles keypress on "underline" button. Calls format method with bold parameter and selection in the note area.
        Parameters:
        e - {ActionEvent} action event which fires when user clicks a button.

      • format

        private void format​(java.lang.String style,
                    javafx.scene.control.IndexRange range)
        Used in formatting note content. Checks if textarea already contains style in question. Otherwise applies style in question.
        Parameters:
        style - {String} is the name of the style
        range - {IndexRange} is the index range of the style

      • handleFontSize

        private void handleFontSize​(javafx.event.ActionEvent e)
        Cycles font size for currently selected area. There are three different font sizes. Sizes are defined in FontStyle. Notifies auto save thread that there is modified content.
        Parameters:
        e - {ActionEvent} event which fires on user clicking a button.

      • getFile

        public void getFile()
        Opens a file to the application.

      • saveFile

        public void saveFile()
        Saves a file to the computer.

      • handleFont

        private void handleFont​(javafx.event.ActionEvent e)
        Changes font based on user selection.
        Parameters:
        e - {ActionEvent} fires when user selects an item from a list.

      • initFonts

        private void initFonts()
        Initializes fonts currently installed on system to a list.

      • handleNote

        private void handleNote​(javafx.scene.input.KeyEvent e)
        Handles what to do with the note after a change is made. If the state is online, activates autosaving after a certain period of time and if the state is offline, doesn't activate the autosaving.
        Parameters:
        e - keyevent, does nothing
        See Also:
        OnlineState, OfflineState

      • getIsModified

        public boolean getIsModified()
                      throws java.lang.InterruptedException
        Returns isModified variable.
        Returns:
        isModified {boolean}
        Throws:
        java.lang.InterruptedException - if thread is interrupted

      • setIsModified

        public void setIsModified​(boolean mod)
                   throws java.lang.InterruptedException
        Modifies state of isModified variable based on if user is typing a new note.
        Parameters:
        mod - value to be set.
        Throws:
        java.lang.InterruptedException - if thread is interrupted

        public void disableProperties()
        Disables properties in the main layout, that cannot be accessed at the time. Called if the state is online
        See Also:

      • disableProps

        public void disableProps()
        Disables properties in the main layout, that cannot be accessed at the time. Called if the state is offline
        See Also:
        OfflineState

      • disableList

        public void disableList​(boolean b)
        Disables list of notes. Prevents user changing notes when saving is underway.
        Parameters:
        b - {boolean} boolean value to be passed to setDisable. True when disabling is wanted. Else otherwise.
